message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you, but I'm open to discussing the price further.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, but the product's value is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I need to be firm on the value of this product.  $10,000 is my final offer - I believe it's a fair compromise.
I understand your firm stance, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9,200 for the product. Can you reconsider?
